#summary PLEASE READ THIS BEFORE POSTING A NEW ISSUE

= Fist time here? Read this =
  * Check the [FAQ FAQ]
  * Search the [http://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/issues/list Issues List] to check if somebody has already filed the same problem.
  * Search the mailing lists to see if anyone has experienced a problem similar to yours.
  ** [http://groups.google.com/group/bigbluebutton-users BigBlueButton-users]
  ** [http://groups.google.com/group/bigbluebutton-dev BigBlueButton-developers]
  ** [http://groups.google.com/group/bigbluebutton-setup BigBlueButton-setup]
  * If you are having problems setting up BigBlueButton, or getting any of it's functionality up and running, write to the [http://groups.google.com/group/bigbluebutton-setup BigBlueButton-setup] mailing list. The folks there will be able to help you better and more quickly that posting an issue to the tracker would.
  * If you've gone through all of the above and still can't get your problem solved/find your issue, then write to the [http://groups.google.com/group/bigbluebutton-dev BigBlueButton-developers] mailing list to ask about your problem. Once you get confirmation from a developer that this is in fact a bug, you can go ahead and file it to the [http://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/issues/list Issues List]. Please post a url to the original discussion in your Issue description.
  * If you have a *FEATURE REQUEST*, write to the [http://groups.google.com/group/bigbluebutton-dev BigBlueButton-developers] mailing list with your feature proposal before filing an enhancement request.
